LanguageData.USH_HE_ConfirmInstallCyberlinkIntellectu: A hacker must be capable of intellectual tasks to operate.\n\nAre you sure you want to continue?
LanguageData.USH_HE_CommandChooseDataOutputDesc: Select what should be outputted as a result of hacking this device.
LanguageData.USH_HE_OrderHackTargetDesc: Select a target to be hacked by this hacker.
LanguageData.USH_HE_SecurityHacksetDesc: What kind of hackset protects this device during hacking.
LanguageData.USH_HE_HackActionsHacksetDesc: What hack actions are contained in this type of hackset.
LanguageData.USH_HE_CommandIgnoreAutoHackDesc: If enabled the hacker will automatically target all hackable devices ignoring their auto hack toggle.
LanguageData.USH_HE_CommandStartWakingDesc: Slowly and safely disconnects contained hacker from the cyberspace and automatically ejects him after completion.
LanguageData.USH_HE_CyberspaceLetter:
{PAWN} with an installed cyberlink started hacking {BUILDING}, which is protected by {HACKSET}. It means that the hacker is now vulnerable to new cyberthreats and can trigger special security responses with a chance depending on the hacker’s stealth.

Colonists not connected to cyberspace by a link will not be affected, so you should always consider who is hacking devices with more advanced and possibly lethal security hacksets.

And remember: there is no spoon.
LanguageData.USH_HE_RaidLetter: It looks like the hacker who previously used the cyberdeck somehow angered {FACTION}, and they are now coming to this location. It’s possible that they’ve been trying to track down the hacker for months, or even longer.\n\nThey will arrive soon.
